meanings.definition: Planned or arranged at a certain time.
meanings.sent1: The scheduled meeting was set for 3 o'clock.
meanings.sent2: The flight departed at its scheduled time.
meanings.sent3: The scheduled picnic got rained out, so we had an indoor party instead.
meanings.sent4: Her life felt like a scheduled routine, each day blending into the next.
meanings.sent5: The scheduled fireworks display lit up the night sky with bursts of color.

meanings.definition: Included in a list of planned events or activities.
meanings.sent1: The scheduled movie night was a hit with all the kids.
meanings.sent2: The scheduled maintenance of the equipment kept everything running smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The scheduled bake-off turned into a hilarious flour fight.
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe was like a scheduled fashion show, with outfits planned for each day.
meanings.sent5: The scheduled parade brought joy to the entire town with its colorful floats.
